rules.description: Move zxcvb one step to the left
o+p = brightness up, l+; brightness down
y+u = vol. up, h+j vol. down
K + L to double quote, .+, for single quote
Delimiter Layer Trigger [A+S as trigger key]
Numeric Keypad Trigger [D + F as trigger key, Tab if alone]
Symbols Keypad Trigger [S + D as trigger key, Hyphen if alone]
Long press for e,p,o for å/ä/ö
Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
